video.title: My Fair Wedding
video.synopsis: Wedding planner David Tutera surprises brides who have only weeks before their big day, and irons out all the details, from the dress to the cake.

episodes.synopsis: David is pushed to his limit by an over-the-top burlesque bride-to-be. For her big day, Sophia wants pasties, a latex dress and no compromises.
episodes.title: Burlesque Bride

episodes.synopsis: With a groom who loves the '40s and a bride who loves mermaids, David has to make this wedding sing. But this quirky couple is hiding a big secret.
episodes.title: Mermaid Bride

episodes.synopsis: Bride-to-be Erika wants a Mexican-themed wedding, but her future in-laws insist she honor Samoan tradition. David must disarm a pushy mother-in-law.
episodes.title: Mexican Polynesian Wedding

episodes.synopsis: David creates a high-flying event for a couple with a passion for travel. Bride Debbie is thrilled, but anxious groom Daniel is getting in the way.
episodes.title: Traveling Teacher Bride

episodes.synopsis: Bride Melanie thinks her groom, Dominic, is heaven-sent. David takes their heaven-and earth themed wedding plans from tacky to fab.
episodes.title: Heaven and Earth Bride

episodes.synopsis: Bride Kandice wants togas at her ancient Rome-themed wedding; groom Bryan disagrees. David tries to keep her wedding classy and her dad in line.
episodes.title: Ancient Rome Bride

episodes.synopsis: Wedding planner David Tutera reveals his favorite behind-the-scenes moments, including drunken brides, bad fashion and the worst wedding themes.
episodes.title: David, Divas and Disasters

episodes.synopsis: Three controlling sisters push David Tutera to his limit as he plans a Kardashian-inspired wedding for couple Vanessa and Adam.
episodes.title: Bitchin' Sisters

episodes.synopsis: The mother of the bride goes head-to-head with couple Mia and Matt, as David, who is caught in the middle, plans their Casablanca-themed wedding.
episodes.title: Momzilla

episodes.synopsis: A shy bride feels left out when David only bonds with her groom. But after a risqué photo shoot, she finds her voice and demands David's attention.
episodes.title: Baroque, Pin-Ups and Hot Rods

episodes.synopsis: Wedding planner David Tutera reveals behind-the-scenes stories of the most demanding brides, his favorite brides and the biggest big-day meltdowns.
episodes.title: Best Brides

episodes.synopsis: Bride Amber wants to wear an Indian sari, but her stunt man fiancé insists she wear white. The groom's loud-mouthed buddy intervenes.
episodes.title: Bollywood BBQ

episodes.synopsis: A mom threatens to leave her daughter's wedding if she doesn't get her way. When bride Darlene has a meltdown, David attempts to fix the family drama.
episodes.title: Family Feud Bride

episodes.synopsis: Reality TV star Rachel Reilly threatens to go bridezilla on David when she disagrees with his plans for her star-studded wedding.
episodes.title: Reality TV Star Bride
